Title: Pc not shutting down Throws thousands of errors
Author: Stella-kei
Description: ![]() Hey my pc doesn't shutdown sometimes. Whenever this happens I go look at my event viewer after and it throws like 1k to 10k errors depends on how many mins I wait till I force shutdown. The error I get (The server {F9717507-6651-4EDB-BFF7-AE615179BCCF} did not register with DCOM within the required timeout). I found the code in registry but dunno what to do.
EnhancedContent: Hey my pc doesn't shutdown sometimes. Whenever this happens I go look at my event viewer after and it throws like 1k to 10k errors depends on how many mins I wait till I force shutdown. The error I get (The server {F9717507-6651-4EDB-BFF7-AE615179BCCF} did not register with DCOM within the required timeout). I found the code in registry but dunno what to do.
